title: Obama To Host Chinese President At White House On September 25
content:
US President Barack Obama will host Chinese President Xi Jinping at the White House for an official State Visit on September 25. Xi Jinping is reciprocating Obama's State Visit to China in November 2014.

The Chinese President's visit will present an opportunity to expand U.S.-China cooperation on a range of global, regional, and bilateral issues of mutual interest, while also enabling the two Presidents to address areas of disagreement constructively, said a statement by White House Press Secretary. 

Obama and his wife Michelle Obama will host President Xi and his wife Peng Liyuan at an official State Dinner on the evening of September 25, it added. 

by RTT Staff Writer

For comments and feedback: editorial@rttnews.com
